humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is one positive lymph node (1/1) in the sentinel lymph node biopsy. Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that a sentinel lymph node biopsy was performed and one sentinel lymph node (out of one examined) was found to be positive for malignancy. This corresponds to an N1 stage in the TNM classification system. The exact number of positive lymph nodes and the presence of extranodal extension are not provided in the report, so we cannot determine if there is any substaging information.
